product_name: Maui Jim Kawika Polarized Sunglasses - Men's
long_description: The Maui Jim Kawika Polarized Sunglasses combine vintage-inspired design with new and advanced lens materials-perfect for those who want performance and a modern twist to the retro trend. PolarizedPlus2 lenses eliminate 99.9% of glare; MauiPure lens material is super light for comfortable all-day wear. Patented multi-layer design and lens treatment maximize color transmission and enhance visible color. Waterproof, oil-resistant coating sheds water and repels grease and smudges. Black Gloss/Antique Pewter frames feature Neutral Grey lenses for bright, direct sunlight; they offer very high light reduction, rich color and contrast. Tortoise/Antique Gold frames feature HCL (High Contrast Lens) Bronze lenses for added contrast on overcast or foggy days; subtle bronze tint is ideal for variable sunlight. Vintage design is ideal for everyday, active lifestyles and complements oval, heart and triangular face shapes; they fit best on small to medium faces. The Maui Jim Kawika Polarized Sunglasses feature traditional hinges and non-slip silicone nose pads. Sunglasses come with a case and cleaning cloth.
short_description: The Maui Jim Kawika Polarized Sunglasses combine vintage-inspired design with new and advanced lens materials-perfect for those who want performance and a modern twist to the retro trend.
